SELECT proj.id as id, proj.kee as "key", proj.name as name, qg.id as gateId FROM projects proj LEFT JOIN project_qgates prqg ON prqg.project_uuid=proj.uuid AND prqg.quality_gate_uuid = #{query.gateUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN quality_gates qg ON qg.uuid = prqg.quality_gate_uuid where proj.qualifier = 'TRK' and proj.enabled = ${_true} and proj.main_branch_project_uuid is null and proj.copy_component_uuid is null and proj.organization_uuid=#{query.organizationUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and qg.id IS NOT NULL
and qg.id IS NULL
and (proj.kee = #{query.projectSearch} or upper(proj.name) like #{query.projectSearchUpperLikeSql} escape '/')
order by proj.name
